short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide All Images Within Page While You Work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide Images 0.10 Extension, is the easiest way to simply hide all "Images" displayed on the page.

how it works:

* Go to chrome menu.
* Navigate to "More Tools", Then "Extensions".
* Now Allow The "Hide Images" Extension.
* And You Done.
